title: Update profile photo asset, Google Drive label, and footer closing message

requirements.text: Replace the Hero section avatar image with the user-uploaded profile photo by generating/placing it as a static asset at `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`, keeping the existing Hero avatar `img` src pointing to `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg`. Use the uploaded `cropped_circle_image.png` as the source input for this asset.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` exists in the build output and visually matches the uploaded photo.
The Hero section continues to load the avatar from `/assets/generated/vibhanshu-profile.dim_512x512.jpg` without any backend fetch.
No broken image icon is shown for the avatar on page load.

requirements.text: Update the Contact section Google Drive card text so it includes the word "Projects" in brackets, i.e., display "Google Drive (Projects)" for the Google Drive contact item.

quotes: and In google Drive Write add this "Projects" work in brackets.

acceptanceCriteria: In the Contact section, the Google Drive contact card displays the text "Google Drive (Projects)".
The Google Drive card still links to the existing `cvData.contact.googleDrive` URL and opens in a new tab.

requirements.text:

quotes:

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only components).
Do not add any backend dependency for serving the profile photo; serve it only as a static frontend asset.
nonGoals: Changing any other CV content (experience/education/skills/projects) beyond the Google Drive label text update.
Adding new contact methods or changing the Google Drive URL.
Changing the site theme, layout, or navigation behavior.
